lines.text: Bruce Lee taught Jackie Chan... Jackie Chan taught Alain Delon... Alain Delon taught Stallone... Stallone taught Ti Lung. Ti Lung told me. Didn't he tell you? Oh, well.

[as Francis and Michael learn they are partners]
That's more like it. You two are partners now. Do you know how I managed to go from being a constable to a chief inspector?
By kissing ass and telling tales?
Don't say that loudly! Your father taught me to do that.
What have you heard around town, Brother Loong?
Lots. A rookie cop held a gun to you and you pissed your pants in fright. How can you show your face around town?
Miss, where's Marydonna?
She should have finished her class. Maybe she's taking a shower. May I ask who's asking for her?
Mark Gor.
Well, Mark Gor, please fill out this survey.
[Ping holds two women captive, forcing Francis and Michael to give him a pair of pants]
Michael Tso! Take off your trousers!

[without thinking, and in English]
Yes, sir!
[pauses]
Why me?
I'm the sergeant. Take off your pants!
[assuring Ping]
They're on the way!
How I face people?
You're responsible for two innocent lives!
I can shoot him dead with one shot!
Hurry up! Remove your pants!
Fine! I'll do it, then!
Hurry up!
He's taking them off right now. Don't hurt the girls!
Throw them down!
[Michael throws his pair of pants onto a tree]
You want to play tricks on me? I'll kill them!
There's still one more pair. Wait a second, okay?
[to Michael]
You little shit! You set me up, didn't you?
No, sergeant. It's windy.
Windy, my ass! I haven't felt the wind today.
Even the desperate need to catch their breath.
How can I face the citizens of Hong Kong now?
[first lines]
Hey, wake up! Wake up! Hey, wake up, and put on your clothes! My wife's home! Hey!
You have a wife?
Whatever. Put on your clothes! I'll explain it to you another day.
What do you mean "Put on my clothes?" This is my home!
Your home? Then, who's the person trying to get in?
Oh! My husband's back!
Your husband? Why didn't you tell me earlier?
I told you! You just pretended not to understand.
I'm deaf! When I hit on you, you should've said something!
Hurry up! My husband hates cops!
I hate other people's husbands, too!
I'm Dummy.
You sure look like one.
Someone points a gun at you, and piss in your pants! Now, the whole station knows about it!
Don't shout! Even those who didn't know about it know now!
And don't bother going after my sister.
I won't. I haven't even thought about it.
That's good. My sister is expensive goods. You look too much like a thug.
Ok, Sergeant.
[after Michael tries to arrest someone who looks like a thug]
What are you doing?
He looks like a thug!
He's my neighbor!

[talking in his sleep]
Don't fish in troubled waters. Go back...
Gentlemen, what can I help you with in the lingerie section?
Ah, I need to buy a bra.
A bra? Is it for your home use, or for going out?
No, it's for my wife.
What's the size, then? How big is she?
I forgot to measure.
Like Elsie Chan?
Not that big!
Then Pat Ha?
She doesn't have any!
Anita Mui?
Her breasts change!
Then is she as big as me?
You're too much!
